description: This file provides standardized error handling utilities for a React JavaScript frontend project, including error catching, logging, and message mapping.

methods.name: safeTry(fn, onError, auditContext = { beforeState: null })
methods.description: Executes a provided function, catches any errors, performs an audit log, and optionally calls an error handler.

methods.name: toUserMessage(technicalError)
methods.description: Converts technical error objects or messages into user-friendly messages.

ctags.name: safeTry
ctags.pattern: /^export function safeTry(fn, onError, auditContext = { beforeState: null }) {$/
